alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 1:47PM MST until April 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Nevada, Northeast Clark County, Sheep Range, Las Vegas Valley and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing dust will create a reduction in visibility. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds and elevated waves are likely on Lake Mead and Lake Mohave which will prove dangerous to small craft.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Plateau
